description:
★ ★ ★ ★ ★  WAGmob: Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★

WAGmob brings you a Simple 'n Easy on-the-go learning app for Minerals. The app helps you understand the basics in a nice and organized manner. Features include tutorials, quizzes and more.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback. Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App tools include search feature.



Includes following tutorials:

Introduction,
Calcium,
Chromium,
Copper,
Fluoride,
Iodine,
Iron,
Magnesium,
Manganese,
Molybdenum,
Phosphorus,
Potassium,
Zinc.

Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Introduction,
Quiz on Chromium, Iodine and Iron,
Quiz on Magnesium and Phosphorus.

What is unique about WAGmob apps?

1) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

2) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

3) Over 350,000 paying customers from 175+ countries.


Our Vision: Provide simple ‘n easy apps for on-the-go learning.

Our Mission: A WAGmob app in every pocket.

Please write to us Team@WAGmob.com. We would love to improve this app.
